ServiceDetail.ctaTitle: Ready to optimize your supply chain?

NotFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
NotFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

AboutPage.heroSubtitle: Pioneering smart logistics solutions at the border.
AboutPage.missionText: Our mission is to deliver transparent, efficient, and sustainable logistics solutions, breaking down trade barriers and connecting Vietnamese businesses with the world. Our vision is to become the leading provider of 'Smart Border Logistics' in the region.

timeline.y2025: Established Phu Anh Trading and Transportation Co., Ltd. Began construction of a logistics center at Ta Lung border gate.
timeline.y2026: Officially commenced operations. Successfully implemented a smart shipment tracking system.
timeline.y2027: Expanded branch at Tra Linh border gate, increasing total warehouse area to 100,000 m².

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.description: We’re always ready to listen. Connect with Phu Anh through the information below or submit your request via the contact form.

faq.q1: What are the company’s working hours?
faq.a1: Our office operates from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday to Friday. However, our border gate operations team works 24/7 to ensure continuous cargo clearance.
faq.q2: How can I track my shipment?
faq.a2: You can use the provided AWB number to track your shipment directly on our website via the 'Track Shipment' box on the homepage or by visiting the Tracking page.
faq.q3: Does Phu Anh provide LCL services?
faq.a3: Yes, we offer comprehensive services for both Full Container Load (FCL) and Less than Container Load (LCL) shipments across borders.

CareersPage.title: Career Opportunities
CareersPage.noOpenings: We currently have no open positions. Please check back later.

CareerDetailPage.applySuccess: Thank you for your application! We will review your profile and contact you if suitable.
CareerDetailPage.applyError: Application submission failed. Please try again.

ManifestoPage.title: Our Manifesto
ManifestoPage.subtitle: Connecting Trade - Elevating Value
ManifestoPage.value1Text: All processes, costs, and order statuses are digitized and easily accessible to customers. We believe transparency is the foundation of trust.
ManifestoPage.value2Text: By leveraging technology and automation, we are committed to reducing clearance times, optimizing logistics costs, and ensuring your cargo reaches its destination as quickly as possible.
ManifestoPage.value3Text: The market is ever-changing, and we stay ahead. Phu Anh continuously researches and applies new technologies like AI and IoT to deliver smart, flexible, and superior logistics solutions.
ManifestoPage.value4Text: Business growth must go hand-in-hand with social and environmental responsibility. We prioritize green transportation solutions, optimize routes to reduce carbon emissions, and build a sustainable logistics ecosystem.

TrackingPage.title: Track Your Shipment
TrackingPage.trackingPlaceholder: Enter one or more AWB numbers, separated by commas
TrackingPage.errorDescription: Unable to load information at this time. Please try again later.
TrackingPage.notFoundDescription: We couldn’t find any shipments matching the AWB number(s): {awbs}. Please check your input.
TrackingPage.noEvents: No events recorded for this shipment.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
WhyChooseUs.point1Text: We utilize real-time tracking, smart warehouse management systems (WMS), and electronic customs declarations to ensure your cargo is handled quickly and accurately.
WhyChooseUs.point2Text: Our experienced team of experts is available 24/7 to provide consultation and support, ensuring your issues are resolved professionally.
WhyChooseUs.point3Text: Located at the Ta Lung border gate, our logistics center serves as a vital trade link, optimizing time and costs for shipments between Vietnam and China.

Metadata.defaultTitle: Phu Anh Trading and Transportation Co., Ltd.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Use
TermsPage.content:
Welcome to the website of Phu Anh Trading and Transportation Co., Ltd.

By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with the terms and conditions outlined below. Please read carefully before using our services.

### 1. User Responsibilities
Users are responsible for providing accurate information when requesting quotes or using online services. Any abuse, tampering, or attempts to breach the system are strictly prohibited.

### 2. Intellectual Property
All content, images, and branding on this website are the property of Phu Anh Trading and Transportation Co., Ltd. Any unauthorized copying or use is a violation.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.content:
Phu Anh Trading and Transportation Co., Ltd. is committed to protecting your personal information.

This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when you visit our website.

### 1. Information Collection
We collect information you provide through contact forms, including: full name, email, phone number, and request details. We may also collect technical data, such as IP addresses, for analytics purposes.

### 2. Information Use
Your information is used to:
- Contact and respond to your requests.
- Improve service and website quality.
- Send important updates (with your consent).
We commit to not sharing your information with third parties without your consent.
